title: Blind Pick=Toxic
body:
So I'm going in a blind pick game, I type in "mid or jg pref" for most of them probably like 1st or 2nd pick

Apparently when you type that the first time, you have 3 people who instalock jg but type nothing in chat. Then they go 0/15. 2/12, and 2/6 for the guy who actually got jungle.

When you have to do that a second time, people call jg and mid, and  instalock in mid or jungle and you have to play support, even though you said either one of those roles first. 

They also said "You can only choose 1 role." 

Apparently they think I'm calling two roles when I said "Mid or jg pref." 

Then your ADC yells at you for taking 1 creep. 

Then when you go 0/4 because they did that, apparently you're the one who is salty. Totally not the ADC who keeps cursing and saying report me for taking 1 creep..... 

That's blind pick. Thank god Riot fixed champ select. At least I don't have to play that anymore.

replies.body: Blind pick is kinda known for instalocks.

toxic people =/= toxic game type, just report them afterwards.

i like blind pick because i dont have to wait 30 minutes since i start queue to the moment the game starts

I play it. I get teammates like those every 2 games per day. Except this time I decided to troll because I have teammates like those every day i play this game, so I thought to myself "I'ma have some fun."
funny thing was, all of them were somehow still feeding even though they were actually trying.

Before, I would have a team where I would call jg or mid, and they lock in someone like {{champion:103}} and go 1/5 while I had to play support

Look at my match history, and the games where I didn't play {{champion:56}},{{champion:38}},{{champion:31}}. That means I called mid or jg, but people instalock in champions. Like examples would be {{champion:78}} or {{champion:25}}. Especially towards the more recent matches I have. Like the last match I had. I decided to troll so I fed 0/4 as {{champion:31}}
Whats worse was that no one states anything because the guys who do that have like a large party of 2 or 4.
